description:
Want a simple way to accept payments online? Using Stripe is the perfect answer. Learn how to integrate Stripe seamlessly into your site, without a merchant account or gateway. Stripe handles everything, including storing cards, subscriptions, and direct payouts to your bank account.

Learn from Saikat Chakrabarti (Lead Engineer at Stripe) about how to develop a website that hooks into the Stripe API and processes payments. 

This is a great class for developers who are interested in payment processing. Whether your client wants to sell something as simple as a t-shirt, or is in need of a fully customizable e-commerce solution, the Stripe API can handle it. 

</p>
title: Integrating Payments with the Stripe API
